content: Hi there I’m a Computer Scientist in Istanbul, Turkey 🇹🇷. I am mainly working on Backend Development NOW ✨ Crafted last Intel 8080 disassembler; 💾 Working on Kernel Development BIO 🏢 I’m currently working on OS Development ⚙️ I use daily: .C, .C++, .Python, .NASM, .Java 🌱 Learning all about Deep Learning and Low Level Programming 💬 Ping me about Open Source Software, Deep Learning, Assembly Language, C Programming, Kernel Development 📫 Reach me: github.com/lvntky 🏋️‍♂️ Fun Fact: I’am very into bodybuilding and powerlifting.
